about.description: We believe in the power of intentional living—each moment, each choice, each breath an opportunity to cultivate inner peace and outer harmony.
about.missionDesc: To bring authentic wellness experiences into everyday life. We curate products that nurture mind, body, and spirit, making the art of self-care accessible to everyone seeking balance in a busy world.
about.visionDesc: A world where holistic well-being is woven into the fabric of daily existence. We envision communities embracing mindfulness, where inner peace and outer harmony become the foundation of a fulfilled life.
about.valuesDesc: Authenticity guides our curation. Sustainability shapes our choices. Mindfulness inspires our purpose. Every product we offer reflects our commitment to quality, ethics, and the genuine pursuit of wellness.
about.storyDesc: Born from a passion for traditional wellness practices and modern mindful living, Baucis Zen emerged to bridge ancient wisdom with contemporary needs. We believe everyone deserves moments of tranquility.

withdrawal.metaDescription: Information about your 14-day right to withdraw from purchases at Baucis Zen under EU consumer law.

right.title: Your Right to Withdraw
right.desc: As a consumer in the European Union, you have the right to withdraw from a distance contract within 14 days without giving any reason.

period.title: Withdrawal Period
period.desc: The withdrawal period expires 14 days from the day on which you or a third party designated by you (other than the carrier) physically acquires the goods.

how.title: How to Exercise Your Right
how.para1: To exercise your right of withdrawal, you must inform us of your decision to withdraw from the contract by a clear statement (e.g., a letter sent by post or email).
how.para2: You may use the model withdrawal form below, but it is not obligatory. To meet the withdrawal deadline, it is sufficient to send your communication before the withdrawal period expires.

effects.title: Effects of Withdrawal
effects.item1: We will reimburse all payments received from you, including delivery costs (except additional costs if you chose a type of delivery other than the least expensive standard delivery offered by us).
effects.item2: Reimbursement will be made without undue delay and no later than 14 days from the day we receive notice of your withdrawal.
effects.item3: We will use the same means of payment you used for the initial transaction, unless you have expressly agreed otherwise.
effects.item4: We may withhold reimbursement until we have received the goods back or you have supplied evidence of having sent back the goods.

exclusions.title: Exclusions from Right of Withdrawal
exclusions.intro: The right of withdrawal does not apply to:
exclusions.item1: Sealed goods which are not suitable for return due to health protection or hygiene reasons, if unsealed after delivery
exclusions.item2: Goods which are, after delivery, inseparably mixed with other items
exclusions.item3: Goods made to your specifications or clearly personalized
